scripts.deploy-all: npm run build && git add . && git commit -m "Deploy build" && git push origin main && npm run ghpages-deploy
scripts.analyze: webpack --config webpack.prod.js --profile --json > stats.json && npx webpack-bundle-analyzer stats.json
scripts.fix-pages: git checkout -B gh-pages && git rm -rf . && git clean -fdx && git checkout main -- dist && mv dist/* ./ && rmdir dist && git add . && git commit -m "Clean gh-pages: deploy only dist files" && git push origin gh-pages --force
scripts.clean-cache: rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json && npm cache clean --force && npm run install-dependencies
scripts.install-dependencies: npm install -D jest babel-jest @babel/core @babel/preset-env node-localstorage css-loader csv-loader gh-pages globals html-loader html-webpack-plugin style-loader webpack-cli webpack-dev-server webpack-merge webpack
scripts.pagesclean: git checkout gh-pages && rm -rf * && cp -r dist/* . && git add . && git commit -m "Deploy" && git push origin gh-pages --force
